---
title: Submit Delegate Data
---

After creating the new staking flow, we need to submit the data for delegation. After collecting the required inputs as mentioned below, we `PUT /api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` to move on to the next step.

### Parameters

- `name` - `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` - `array`
  - `delegator_address` - `string` The delegating address (required).
  - `delegator_pubkey` - `string` The public key of the signing account (required).
  - `validator_address` - `string` Address of the validator you want to delegate your tokens to (required).
  - `amount` - `number` - The amount of NEAR to be delegated (required).
  - `max_gas` - `string` Adjust if you wish to limit the possible transaction fee (optional).

#### Sample cURL Request

```json
curl -X PUT 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/aeb7503c-27c8-4184-8537-8f4a77f694a9/next' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
--data '{
  // highlight-start
  "name": "create_delegate_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "delegator_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY",
    "validator_address": "01node.pool.f863973.m0",
    "amount": "25",
    "max_gas": null,
    "delegate_transaction": null
  }
  // highlight-end
}'
```

### Response

The response indicates two possible `actions` :

- `refresh_delegate_tx` — If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction Payload (i.e., the nonce has increased).
- `sign_delegate_tx` — Submit a signed transaction Payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

For the next step, we will choose `sign_delegate_tx`, which indicates one Input to collect:

- `transaction_payload` — The signed transaction Payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

#### Sample Response

```json
{
  "id": "aeb7503c-27c8-4184-8537-8f4a77f694a9",
  "state": "delegate_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": []
    },
    {
      "name": "sign_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "transaction_payload",
          "display": "Transaction Payload",
          "description": "",
          "type": "signed_transaction",
          "validations": [],
          "signers": ["ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY"],
          "transaction_payload": ""
        },
        {
          "name": "signatures",
          "display": "Signatures",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_signatures",
          "validations": [],
          "signers": ["ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY"],
          "transaction_payload": "",
          "signing_payload": "1a45dcf2292e9f43ddb2053ed913ca84291a820549be5b04075f6e2719173fd0"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY",
    "validator_address": "01node.pool.f863973.m0",
    "amount": "25.0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "1a45dcf2292e9f43ddb2053ed913ca84291a820549be5b04075f6e2719173fd0",
      "signed": null,
      "hash": "2mZPUCSVnhKNL1LwWtGXpMzzck9xgVJRtn5g8fJgwTWP",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-09-26T15:24:43.720Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-09-26T15:29:38.291Z"
}
```

The `transaction_paylod` you've received in the response make sure to copy/save it because you'll require it in the next step to sign the transaction.
